casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Randall Clarke MUMPER, Defendant-Appellant. No. 31011

Summary Calendar.**

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 26, 1971. *275Gerald Kogan, Miami, Fla. (Court-appointed) for defendant-appellant. Robert W. Rust, U. S. Atty., Lloyd G. Bates, Jr., Asst. U. S. Atty., Miami, Fla., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir. See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York, et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Judgment affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
